mapper.select: SELECT onkr.id, onkr.user_id, onkr.nick_name, onkr.upper_limit, onkr.kf_rule_id, onkr.user_account, onkr.create_by, onkr.create_time, onkr.update_time, onkr.update_by, su.user_name, onkr.kf_status as status, onkr.avatar FROM one_chat_kf_rule_scope onkr LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON onkr.user_id = su.user_id WHERE onkr.del_flag = '0' AND su.del_flag = '0' and onkr.kf_rule_id=#{ruleId}
